name: Dead Only (Pilly)
description:
You're wanted! 
And they want you dead; there's a bounty on your head. 

The sheriffs know this due to the Wanted posters...but what would happen if you were to take those posters down? It'd leave the sheriffs clueless. 

And can someone tell me why this town has so many sheriffs? 
It'd be best to get out of here.

Originally made for Ludum Dare 44, now with cool features like:

  • A level select screen
  • Visual & level design tweaks
  • Infinitely more dogs

Original version can be found here.
